title: Upon game start, league changes my mouse speed
body: And I have to go into my mouse settings for the pc and lower it back down. How do I make it stop that?

replies.body: League has its own mouse sensitivity and speed settings, so it's perfectly normal for it to feel different outside of game.  If you're alt tabbing often then it can cause mouse issues to stick.  Your best bet is to change your mouse settings in-game to whatever feels best for you.  I hope that helps!

Regardless of in game, it is changing my base system mouse speed. Meaning, I have to go into system settings and put my cursor speed BACK to what it was. Even after the game is over and I shut off league, the speed is permanently changed and I have to undo what league did.

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can investigate this further.  There could be something else getting in the way, though I can't say for sure without digging deeper.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
